column5: Combining business-focused teaching and cutting-edge research, the MSc International Health Management is a one-year, full-time programme that gives you a thorough overview of the UK health system and its application in a global context, while also providing the essential skills needed to springboard you into a management career in the global healthcare sector.This programme combines business-focused teaching and cutting-edge research and gives you the chance to learn from internationally recognised faculty at the forefront of health management research. Our programme is specifically designed to give you an overview of the UK health system and its application in a global context.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
